manual.subtitle: Edition I: The Art of Crema

philosophy.title: The Way of the Pour
paragraphs: In the beginning, there was only the Foam‚Äîa pristine, untouched cream void. Then came the Etcher, guided by your rhythm, bringing the first drop of flavor to the surface.

Rupa is more than a tool; it is your sanctuary. Here, pixels aren't just data points‚Äîthey are Drops. Every mark you make is a deliberate act of brewing that requires flow, focus, and a peaceful heart.
"We do not just paint pixels; we etch moments into the crema of time."

pillars.title: The Etcher
pillars.description: Your voice on the foam. Move it with the Arrow Keys to guide your patterns with barista precision.

pillars.title: The Flavors
pillars.description: Rich extracts and syrups. Apply them with Space and switch flavors using the numbers on your keyboard.

pillars.title: The Infusions
pillars.description: Layers of depth. Like stacking fine flavors, each infusion adds a new dimension to your cup.

techniques.title: Continuous Flow
techniques.description: Hold Ctrl while moving to stream flavor across the foam. Flow with the rhythm of the bar.

techniques.title: Spirit Selection
techniques.description: Press W to select all connected drops of the same tone. A magical way to move patterns.

techniques.title: The Spindle
techniques.description: The axis of time. Create sequences of cups to see your work in motion. Press P to feel the pulse.

techniques.title: Resonance
